question.text:
Which of the following becomes clear about the main character in paragraph 1?
A He has accepted a position as a diplomat in a country that has an unstable political climate.
B He is about to hand in his resignation for a post he has only recently been promoted to.
c He is an experienced English spy who is adept at blending in without being noticed.
D His inconspicuous appearance belies the confidential and crucial character of his assignment.
